revised_title: The Role of Coal-Dust in Colliery Explosions and its Impact on Mine Safety
tldr: This article investigates the influence of coal-dust in colliery explosions and its impact on mine safety. The author explains how the presence of coal-dust, combined with fire-damp, can create an explosive mixture that can spread throughout a mine, leading to devastating consequences. The author also discusses the importance of understanding the relationship between coal-dust, air, and gas in order to prevent future explosions and improve mine safety.
